summary: This is an email chain between US Attorney's Office (SDNY) staff discussing a meeting with 'Geoff' regarding Epstein forfeiture matters. The tone suggests strategic planning and potential need for expectations management.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Mentioned as someone the email author ran into who wants to meet in the afternoon to discuss Epstein forfeiture; described as sounding 'more bullish' than expected.

events.title: Planned meeting on Epstein forfeiture
events.description: A meeting is being scheduled for the afternoon (around 2:30 or 3 PM) with 'Geoff' to discuss Epstein forfeiture matters.

locations: United States Attorneys Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: The email discusses scheduling a meeting regarding Epstein forfeiture proceedings on August 14, 2019.
The participant 'Geoff' is described as sounding 'more bullish' than expected, indicating potential differences in strategy or approach.
The correspondence originates from the US Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, showing internal coordination on the case.
The email chain shows multiple USANYS staff members agreeing to the meeting time.
The subject line confirms the topic is specifically 'Epstein forfeiture'.
